src:
'This is a PR stunt': medical student confronts Johnson during hospital visit – video
01 Nov 2019, 09:43 by Terry Harris



An angry medical student confronted Boris Johnson while he was visiting Addenbrooke's hospital in Cambridge. Julia Simons, 23, said staff were not informed of the visit and criticised the prime minister for using the hospital for a 'PR stunt' 


'Cowardly' Boris Johnson booed on Cambridge hospital trip
